https://tmrev.io/movie/667026-Alphaville 2007 D.C. 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/coKcKvKXoAKPJXcXhJOcuXPQ4zg.jpg In the midst of a disguised civil war, a cowboy and an executive settle the accounts of Brazilian social apartheid. Taking kidnapping as a starting point, the panorama of urban violence is outlined in a very good mood, in a kind of scintific fiction about the third world. Alphaville 2007 D.C.
